code: limit_route <- sizelimit_route() # Default 5Mb limit rook <- fiery::fake_request('http://www.example.com', 'post',                             headers = list(Content_Length = 30*1024^2)) req <- reqres::Request$new(rook) limit_route$dispatch(req) #> [1] FALSE req$respond() #> A HTTP response #> =============== #>         Status: 413 - Payload Too Large #>   Content type: text/plain #>  #> In response to: http://www.example.com:80/
